Name: [Ether] Invalid Adapter
Desc: Each Standard [Ether] Resonium owned increases Agent <color=#FE437E>Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> by <color=#2BAD00>6%</color>, up to a maximum increase of <color=#2BAD00>48%</color>.
Desc2: Much like a mobile phone data cable, it connects multiple Bangboo for data connection. However, it also shares another trait with data cables: it's prone to breaking.
